name: Biomass (David Mills - 3D Generalist)
description:
Whisper Pines. An average little summer camp. With a not so average...monster...

See the campers don’t know it yet, but something is coming... A beast, unassuming in form, but no doubt terrifying to behold. Something that lurks between the bowels of the mysterious, and the depths of the beyond.

Where it comes from, nobody knows. Why it arrived here is equally unclear. However one thing for certain, is that now that it has arrived, nobody is safe from…

...THE BIOMASS!
------------------
NOTE: Currently only GAMEPAD Controls, KEYBOARD inputs coming soon!
